## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                             | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |

| `name`     | `name`     | (optional) Field name                   | `string`  | `''`    |
| `required` | `required` | (optional) Determine if it is mandatory | `boolean` | `false` |
